name: Virtual Pet - Study Project
description:
I'm learning Godot and gdscript so I decided to make this little game.
Right now it is kinda boring and I don't know if it will change since it's just a study project I'm using to learn.
*Only basic sounds

-- You must keep the water temperature balanced, neither hot nor cold 
-- Change the temperature by turning the light on or off
-- Clean  (2 Coins)
--Feed (2 Coins)  needs to be awake to be fed
--Put to sleep
--Play the mini game to gain more coins (50 seconds cooldown)

Yellow bar = Stamina / Blue bar = Hunger

Right bar = XP-Evolution / Left bar = Health

*You can play on mobile but the frame rate will be bad depending on the device. Also *the audio may be delayed playing HTML5 mobile .
